document.forum_title: National security expert: Trump saying Obama is the ‘founder of ISIS’ is ‘just plain nuts’ [Video]
document.topic_text: Brazil women's rugby player Isadora Cerullo accepts a marrige proposal from her girlfriend at Olympic medal ceremony. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
document.post: Is this the best story reuters can come up with from the olympics a couple of carpet munchers get engaged ,why not try out some journalism for a change ??
